sentences.sContent: But comet kohoutek offered astronomers a unique opportunity to make a concerted attack on many of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: But comet kohoutek offered astronomers a unique opportunity to make a concerted attack on many of them.
sentences.sCn: 科霍切克慧星为天文学家提供了 一个难得的机会，使他们能同时研究其中的许都问题。

trans.tranOther: a comet of almost parabolic orbit that reached its closest approach to the sun in Dec 1973
